Chapter 38

Translator: Mosstree


Chapter 38: "Brothers" Cohabitation


At 10 o’clock in the morning, without Jiang Chengrui’s knowledge, Pei Yuyang had already put Jiang Chengrui’s clothes in his car and then cheerfully driven back home.


Afterwards, Wei Han also packed and Qi Zhifan also brought his car over. Since moving out of the house, Qi Zhifan was also happily alone and carefree, living in a mansion and driving a sports car. The wealthy were very capricious.


“Odd Trouble, can you take me to the station first?”


Qi Zhifan looked him up and down, knitting his brows, “With your appearance as it is, you still want to go there and get tossed around? Aren’t you afraid people would be able to discover something?”


His voice hadn’t fallen when Wei Han’s legs couldn’t stop a tremble from running through. Somewhat awkwardly, he gave two dry coughs: “cough cough. Don’t worry, I usually exercise so it’s not a problem. Since I ran away last night, I have to go back and give an account. Ai, I’m considered as being absent without leave. I’d definitely be given a demerit, and who knows if there will also be some disciplinary action. I just hope that I won’t be dismissed.”


“You’ll be alright.”


Seeing Wei Han deeply worried and sick at heart, Qi Zhifan simply blurted out these three words.


“How can I be alright?” Wei Han looked suspicious. Avoiding it wasn’t a solution, so he still braced himself and gave Jiang Chengrui a call from his cell phone.


As soon as it connected, Jiang Chengrui’s complaining voice came over, “Fuck, Silly Han, you actually still know how to call me. Why don’t you calculate how long you’ve been missing?”


Wei Han weakly said, “I’m sorry ah, Little Jiang, I also don’t want this. But last night was an emergency. Qi Zhifan, he…”


Seeing Wei Han a little hesitant, Jiang Chengrui also said in understanding, “I knew that it was related to your brother Qi Zhifan. I’ve said more than once before: every time you meet him, you’d become a stupid person.”


Wei Han: “……”


“Ai, actually, I’m not very angry now. I thought you were missing, but Qi Zhifan called and said that you were there. I was also a little relieved.”


“Ah?” Wei Han looked up at Qi Zhifan beside him and asked again, “It turns out that he’s already told you? When was this?”


“Early this morning, when I was dozing off.”


“Oh oh.” Wei Han nodded and gave Qi Zhifan a profound glance.


“Little Jiang, Leader Lu, he…did he blow up?” Speaking of the no-nonsense Sergeant Lu, Wei Han lowered his voice even more.


“Last night, he was quick to blow up. That look…if you had dared to appear in front of him, it’s estimated that you’d really be ripped apart alive! But today, he suddenly received a notification from a superior, and I also don’t know what it was, but in short, his face eased up a lot.”


“Then my matter, was there any disciplinary action that came down from above?”


“There’s no action for the time being. I’ve been worrying about your matter, but after waiting for a long time, there was still no reaction from those above. They just told you to come to the bureau on time tomorrow. Silly Han, do you have someone covering you from higher up?” Jiang Chengrui was a little curious.


“Uh…” Wei Han looked at Qi Zhifan again and suddenly understood somewhat.


“I…I’m also not too sure.” Wei Han hurriedly changed the topic, “Right, Little Jiang, don’t return to the apartment after work tonight; just go directly to Pei Yuyang’s house. I think he should come to pick you up at night too.”


“Why?”


“I…I moved out to live with Qi Zhifan. Pei Yuyang also brought all your clothes back to his house. The landlady returned our rent, and when I see you, I’ll give it to youー”


Halfway through Wei Han’s words, Jiang Chengrui was already bristling, “Fuck! That damned pervert ah!”


Hanging up the phone, Wei Han was finally a little relieved, though he looked a little gloomily at Qi Zhifan. Qi Zhifan raised his eyebrows, that expression seeming to say “see, I said it’s alright”.


“Qi Zhifan, you don’t have to step in and fix things according to your way next time.”


Wei Han grimly said. The person who covered him, if nothing else, was someone related to Qi Zhifan. Unlike him, no matter what, Qi Zhifan was still part of the Qi family. Old Master Qi was a former bureau chief of the Tax Bureau, and his uncle was also in the Finance Bureau. He had a bunch of behind-the scene supporter aunts too. Moreover, he also seemed to know a lot of capable people.


Qi Zhifan stared blankly. At first, he’d hated when Wei Han kept calling him “Odd Trouble” again and again. Now that he had kept hearing it and was accustomed to it, if Wei Han suddenly decided to change it, contrarily, he’s rather unhappy.


“Having my support isn’t good?”


Wei Han shook his head and squeezed his palm. “The police is the road I chose myself. I want to rely on my own efforts and walk down it step by step, and not because of something else. Have you heard this sentence? Fairness and justice is more glorious than the sun.”


“……”


In an instant, Qi Zhifan seemed to see the shadow of Qi Hao on Wei Han’s body. Really stubborn. It’s no wonder that this fool wanted to be the same as his dad and chose to become a police officer.


Also, seeing Wei Han’s resolute little eyes made Qi Zhifan’s heart itch. He couldn’t help but reach out and rub a hand over Wei Han’s head. “As long as you’re happy.”


At Qi Zhifan’s place, Butler Sun had long since been at the door to greet them.


The several times Wei Han had come before, he’d mostly just visited the front courtyard, so he passed through the front yard and ran to the backyard, turning around with a smile always on his face. This was a beautiful environment with many flower beds and also an oversized, open-air swimming pool. Haha, he could finally enjoy the life of a rich man.


“Odd Trouble, where’s my room ah?”


Wei Han expectantly asked. There were so many rooms here. He really didn’t know if Qi Zhifan, living alone in such a big place, would feel insecure or not.


“My room,” Qi Zhifan casually said.


“Ah? That’s not going to work.” Wei Han jumped in fright and continuously waved his hands.


“Why not?” Qi Zhifan crossed his arms in a bad mood.


“How do you explain it to mom and Uncle Qi when they come to see us? And ‘distance gives rise to beauty’. We should give each other some breathing room. And I usually leave early and return late, sometimes I’m also on the night duty shift, so I’d inevitable disturb you with the noise.”


Wei Han forced a smile and counted out the explanations on his fingers. There was actually another reason that he didn’t have the nerve to say. Recalling the experience of being pressed down last night, it was a really a bit tragic. Wei Han was a little scared, and his chrysanthemum still had some pain.


After listening to Wei Han pull out a pile of reasons, Qi Zhifan felt a burst of speechlessness. “Wei Han, do you know what cohabitation means?”


Wei Han nodded. “I know. Didn’t we live under the same roof before?”


“……” Qi Zhifan was even more speechless. “You really have no love experience.”


Hearing this statement made Wei Han a bit upset, his look changing a bit. “Yeah, it’s far less than you. That night, why did you go to the nightclub in the Southern District? And also got drugged?”


“You only remember to ask this now? You’ve clearly already slept with meー”


Where would he let Qi Zhifan continue to talk about this? Wei Han hurriedly interrupted him, “Don’t pull it in a strange direction. Quick, what was going on?”


Because previously, Six Hot had given Wei Han the “counter-playing hard to get” move and caused Wei Han to completely ignore him for a period of time, Qi Zhifan was always in a bad mood.


That day, it happened that someone invited Qi Zhifan to come out for a drink. It was Little Chu, who was in the same faculty as Qi Zhifan. Little Chu’s father opened a department store, so he could also be considered a young master. When they met up, Young Master Chu also brought a group of friends as well as his younger sister.


Little Chu had investigated Qi Zhifan and knew that he ate both men and women, and also knew that the Qi family behind him was very strong. Little Chu always wanted to introduce his younger sister to him and to intentionally play matchmaker for them, but it was hopeless: Qi Zhifan’s behavior was always cold and detached. As far as he knew, even if it was someone he’d dated before, Qi Zhifan had hardly done anything particularly intimate and was difficult to handle.


Under the heckling of the crowd, Qi Zhifan drank a lot of wine, and also drank a cup of drugged wine.


Later, Little Chu and his younger sister brought him to the hotel. Little Chu gave a meaningful glance and told his younger sister to directly pounce on him. It’d be best to have sex and directly get pregnant.


But he hadn’t expected that Qi Zhifan would wake up suddenly and, with an extremely ugly face, directly break off relations with Little Chu, angrily driving out the two brother and sister. But the drug effect was still there. Qi Zhifan kept enduring, and with his mind filled with Wei Han, he made that phone call…


If it weren’t for being vexed in his heart because of Wei Han then, Qi Zhifan wouldn’t have fallen for such a hackneyed trick. However, also because of this, he’d eaten Wei Han.


After listening to Qi Zhifan’s narrative, Wei Han couldn’t help but sigh emotionally. “Wow, Odd Trouble, you’re really capable of enduring ah. If it were me, I may not necessarily be able to control myself.”


Qi Zhifan: “……”


What was this fool focusing on?


A bit angry, Qi Zhifan grasped Wei Han’s wrist and pulled him all the way to his room. Wei Han was pulled by him and stumbled a few steps. “Hey, Odd Trouble, slow…slow down. I’m a disabled person now.”


Qi Zhifan sneered and directly tossed this “disabled person” on the bed.


Wei Han was a little panicked at this time and hurriedly smiled obsequiously, “Odd Trouble, don’t be mad. Actually, I was just kidding.”


Just after he finished, Qi Zhifan had already pressed close to his body and raised up his T-shirt. His hand touched the waist and he lightly pinched it.


Wei Han immediately trembled and twisted his waist. “Aiyo, hurts! Good little brother, please be merciful. You’ve already tossed me all night, last night.”


“Don’t call me ‘good little brother’.” He didn’t want to be the little brother of this fool.


“Uh, then good Trouble.” Wei Han rolled his eyes, miserably blinking his eyes at him. “Good Trouble, please let me go.”


Qi Zhifan was startled. This fool was trying to use the “sell meng while pretending to be innocent” trick. Also, what was this “good Trouble” thing? It sounded as if he was very troublesome.


“Don’t move. I’ll help you rub your waist.”


Qi Zhifan’s somewhat cool fingers wandered around his waist, stimulating Wei Han to shiver slightly, and then Qi Zhifan gently rubbed it a few times, making Wei Han both sore and tingly. Wei Han couldn’t bear it and caught Qi Zhifan’s hand. Shaking his head in discomfort, he said, ” I…I will rub it myself. I know my own body.”


Qi Zhifan’s fingers slipped down again, pinching twice on Wei Han’s upturned ass and wandered close to the hole in the deep crack in between, his pupils darkening. “Is it? Then did you managed to clean here too?”


Wei Han face suddenly turned red, and embarrassingly nodded.


Qi Zhifan shook his head and smiled. “Then I’ll check it.”


Words finished, he planned to take off Wei Han’s pants. Wei Han was suddenly stunned out of his wits, and then quickly struggled. His right hand suddenly touched a soft little thing and immediately lifted his eyes to look.


In an instant, Wei Han was flashed blind by the touch of hot pink. “……”


This color, this feel, this shameful T-shape, this familiar ball-breaking feeling!


Holy fucking hell, wasn’t this the thong that the awful King Kong Barbie had stuffed into his hand when he’d first first gone to the gay bar long, long ago!


“Odd Trouble, where did you get this thing?”


Why was it always on the bed? The latter half of the sentence, Wei Han wanted to ask, but simply was too ashamed to ask out loud.


Suddenly having this pair of panties revealed, Qi Zhifan, who was calm and collected in all things, was also in a bit of a daze. He took it back, his face slanting to the side. “Don’t mind it. It’s a long story.”


It didn’t matter to Qi Zhifan if this thing was seen by others. But right now, it was unfortunately discovered by the owner, so he was somewhat a little unable to hang onto his face.


“Uh, Odd Trouble, are you being shy now? Don’t worry, I didn’t see anything.”


Seeing Qi Zhifan, who the second before, had been lying on his body acting like a “perverted little brother”, but this second, was acting a bit unnatural, Wei Han quickly played dumb.


“Anyway, when there’s a chance, I’ll give it to you again to wear.”


Wei Han: “……”


Fuck, I don’t want to wear it! Your little brother suddenly became perverted, what do you do?
